name: FunQuestion
0:
”Alexa, play Fun Question.”
”Alexa, open Fun Question.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fun question
des:
Alexa will give you a fun question everyday!

The content is updated everyday with exciting new questions. The first question is always free and new users get 10 free bonus questions which can be used to get one more question everyday. If you subscribe you get the free question and two bonus questions everyday! Answer lots of questions to unlock silly badges.

The question aims to be interesting and a little bit silly. Hopefully it will keep you amused.

HOW TO PLAY THE QUIZ:
Alexa will give you a fun question. 
Answer Alexa's question by saying A, B or C.
New questions everyday!
Win badges as you answer more questions. 
Let me know what badge you have unlocked.

TOP TIP:
Add this skill to a daily routine and never miss a question.

FEEDBACK:
https://hugo.fm/contact

Thanks for reading!

HUGO.FM

----------

I have given everyone 10 free bonus questions to give you a small taste of the questions you get when you are part of the super fun question group (one of the premium questions a day).

Try these Alexa skills:
Alexa, Enable Pub Quiz.
Alexa, Open Big Fart.
Alexa, Enable Mystery Sound.
Alexa, Enable Number Tennis.
Alexa, Enable Word Tennis.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
